    Convert(IEnumerable<Attribute>)

    Converts a collection of attributes into an Zentient.Abstractions.Metadata.IMetadata instance.

    Declaration
    public static IMetadata Convert(IEnumerable<Attribute> attributes)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    IEnumerable<Attribute> attributes

    The collection of attributes to convert.
    Returns
    Type Description
    IMetadata

    An Zentient.Abstractions.Metadata.IMetadata instance representing the metadata defined by the attributes.
